title: The Christmas tree
brief_description: At a special orphanage, the children fall in love with a beautiful pine tree. The evil owner of the orphanage plans to cut down the tree and spoil the children’s holiday. However, Santa keeps watch over the children, hears their Christmas wish and soon all their dreams come true.
